<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Iteration examples. Each component is separated by &#39;,&#39;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @code</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo/bar   =&gt; /,foo,bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ../        =&gt; ..,.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   C:\\foo\\bar =&gt; C:,\\,foo,bar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @endcode</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove the last component from \\a path unless it is the root dir.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Replace the file extension of \\a path with \\a extension.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   ./filename.cpp =&gt; ./filename.extension</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @endcode</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                  prepended.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Replace matching path prefix with another path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo, /old, /new =&gt; /foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old, /old, /new =&gt; /new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old, /old/, /new =&gt; /old</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old/foo, /old, /new =&gt; /new/foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old/foo, /old/, /new =&gt; /new/foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old/foo, /old/, /new/ =&gt; /new/foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /oldfoo, /old, /new =&gt; /oldfoo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo, &lt;empty&gt;, /new =&gt; /new/foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo, &lt;empty&gt;, new =&gt; new/foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /old/foo, /old, &lt;empty&gt; =&gt; /foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @endcode</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param Path If \\a Path starts with \\a OldPrefix modify to instead</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        start with \\a NewPrefix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param OldPrefix The path prefix to strip from \\a Path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param NewPrefix The path prefix to replace \\a NewPrefix with.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param style The style used to match the prefix. Exact match using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Posix style, case/separator insensitive match for Windows style.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result true if \\a Path begins with OldPrefix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#acb31f2db6f0fe5eaa5b28464141223aa">replace&#95;path&#95;prefix</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;Path, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> OldPrefix,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> NewPrefix,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">                         <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Remove redundant leading &quot;./&quot; pieces and consecutive separators.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a6aa32b6763df05d8187ad5551533b567"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a6aa32b6763df05d8187ad5551533b567">remove&#95;leading&#95;dotslash</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#aac3d0ea99ec07497e1d0fd0cdfc18040">LLVM&#95;LIFETIME&#95;BOUND</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In-place remove any &#39;./&#39; and optionally &#39;../&#39; components from a path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path processed path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param remove&#95;dot&#95;dot specify if &#39;../&#39; (except for leading &quot;../&quot;) should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// removed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if path was changed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a35c103b5fb70a66a1cb5da3b56f588a1">remove&#95;dots</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;char&gt;</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> remove&#95;dot&#95;dot = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Append to path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo  + bar/f =&gt; /foo/bar/f</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   /foo/ + bar/f =&gt; /foo/bar/f</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Has filename?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// filename != &quot;&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path has a filename, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ad94879f2cf05db817fc49abbe50fbbb1">has&#95;filename</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Has stem?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// stem != &quot;&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path has a stem, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ac4d78a6e97131191378aa1ca03a6c7f5">has&#95;stem</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Has extension?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extension != &quot;&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path has a extension, false otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a71f8caad22bde933605f9d1634f63288">has&#95;extension</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Is path absolute?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// According to cppreference.com, C++17 states: &quot;An absolute path is a path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that unambiguously identifies the location of a file without reference to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// an additional starting location.&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In other words, the rules are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) POSIX style paths with nonempty root directory are absolute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) Windows style paths with nonempty root name and root directory are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    absolute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3) No other paths are absolute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;directory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path is absolute, false if it is not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#ac35ec1dacb408d4c65d55249c0e02474">is&#95;absolute</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Is path absolute using GNU rules?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// GNU rules are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1) Paths starting with a path separator are absolute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2) Windows style paths are also absolute if they start with a character</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    followed by &#39;:&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3) No other paths are absolute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// On Windows style the path &quot;C:\\Users\\Default&quot; has &quot;C:&quot; as root name and &quot;\\&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// as root directory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Hence &quot;C:&quot; on Windows is absolute under GNU rules and not absolute under</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// C++17 because it has no root directory. Likewise &quot;/&quot; and &quot;\\&quot; on Windows are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// absolute under GNU and are not absolute under C++17 due to empty root name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;name</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\see has&#95;root&#95;directory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param style The style of \\p path (e.g. Windows or POSIX). &quot;native&quot; style</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// means to derive the style from the host.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path is absolute following GNU rules, false if it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a892ec9d16a6daa5ed0965c36fc1caff7">is&#95;absolute&#95;gnu</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Is path relative?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @param path Input path.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// @result True if the path is relative, false if it is not.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a59d172f36ecf079548e9c539ae54e5a4">is&#95;relative</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path">path</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49f">Style</a> style = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/path/#a58cfd8a47c0ef96db27b451c2d6ec49fa8e5f3adee38c8fccc13c1f3be0143796">Style::native</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace path</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace sys</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// end namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
